details.report_title: Employees queued for more than 30 days who need to be added to MyEnroll from UHC.
details.report_help: This dashboard item illustrates the number of employees' location administrators have added to UHC medical but have not kept updated in MyEnroll360. Each month, BAS imports data from your medical plan carrier(s). Once the import is complete, MyEnroll<sup>360</sup>provide you with a report and instructions to use MyEnroll<sup>360</sup>to further identify these imported employees (e.g., home addresses, location assignments) and transfer them into their respective locations.

details.report_title: Locations with school in location name, or teacher in benefit class names where nobody in a location is marked with the Educational Exception indicator
details.report_help: The calendar year for educational organizations typically includes extended breaks when classes are not in session and employees do not perform services. Educational organizations cannot reduce an employee's average hours for employment breaks that fall within a look-back measurement period. Therefore, an employer determines the employee's average hours of service by excluding the employment break from the calculation of average hours.

details.report_title: Locations with one or more employees who are marked with the Vow of Poverty indicator in 2020 tax year
details.report_help: The Vow of Poverty allows those whom have taken a Vow of Poverty to not have hours tracked for Health Care Reform Reporting purposes

details.report_title: Locations with incomplete work hours entry in the past 120-days
details.report_help: This captures locations that have one or more employees whose hours have not been update for 1 or more months over the past 120-days.

details.report_title: Locations with incomplete work hours entry in the past 90-days
details.report_help: This captures locations that have one or more employees whose hours have not been update for 1 or more months over the past 90-days

details.report_title: Locations are incomplete work hours entry in the past 60-days
details.report_help: This captures locations that have one or more employees whose hours have not been update for 1 or more months over the past 60-days

details.report_title: Locations with employees assigned a medical plan benefit, but who are not assigned enough average hours to be classified full-time
details.report_help: This captures locations that have one or more employees who are enrolled in a medical plan but whose average monthly work hours indicate the employee is not full-time. Only full-time employees are eligible for benefits

details.report_title: Locations with employees assigned medical benefits, but no hours applied
details.report_help: This captures locations that have one or more employees who are enrolled in a medical plan but have no monthly work hours setup. Only full-time employees are eligible for benefits, so these employees need to have work hours added.

details.report_title: Locations without EINs assigned
details.report_help: This captures locations that have that do not have Employer Identification Numbers (EINs) assigned. EINs are required, in order to prepare employees' 1095 forms and make complete filings with the IRS

details.report_title: Locations without active administrators
details.report_help: This captures locations that have that do not have an active Administrator setup. Each location must have at least one active Administrator who is responsible for maintaining data and is the point of contact about employees’ data.

details.report_title: Locations with missing legal names
details.report_help: This captures locations that do not have legal organization names setup. A legal name is required, in order to prepare employees’ 1095 forms and make complete filings with the IRS.

details.report_title: Locations without EINs assigned in 2020 tax year for B forms
Locations without active administrators in 2020 tax year for B forms
Locations with missing legal names in 2020 tax year for B forms
Locations with employees having full-time status but no medical plan assigned
details.report_help: This captures locations that have employees whose average work hours indicate the employees should be enrolled in the medical plan but are not enrolled.

details.report_title: Locations with one or more employees who have lost benefit eligibility
details.report_help: This captures locations that have employees whose average work hours indicate the employees should be enrolled in the medical plan but are not enrolled.

details.report_title: Locations with one or more new hires who have become benefit eligible due to Initial Measurement Period Results
details.report_help: This captures locations that have employees whose average work hours indicate the employees should be enrolled in the medical plan but are not enrolled.

details.report_title: Locations with uploaded work hours in error and requiring review
details.report_help: This captures locations for which work hours and other data was uploaded but those uploads still carry errors that the Administrator who performed the uploads should review and manage, accordingly.

details.report_title: Locations with one or more recurring errors as measured over the 2 most current uploads
details.report_help: This captures locations for which work hours and other data was uploaded but those uploads still carry errors that the Administrator who performed the uploads should review and manage, accordingly.

details.report_title: Locations that have a history of uploading work hours, but haven’t used the upload application in more than 45-days
details.report_help: This captures locations that have used the online work hours upload application but haven’t used the application in more than 45-days. This is not an error nor necessarily a problem because some administrators only use the upload application periodically or annually. Nonetheless, we want you to know about this lack of use, in case you believe updates should be occurring more frequently.
